comment: Don't take her!!!!! Absolutely horrible class that I dropped the first day of term. She's openly anti-science and doesn't seem to know anything about the class she's teaching
Don't say I didn't warn you. Do not take her class. She talks about her opinions on how science should work instead of teaching, she gives biased grades, and her emails are passive aggressive.

For the love of everything, do not take her. She got pulled and replaced with a much more qualified professor (Dr Kozlovsky) halfway through her first semester at KSU because all her students were doing so poorly in a class that shouldn't be that difficult. Keep this in mind if they give her a second chance
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Don't if I could give a negative rating I would, you won't learn anything from her and 80% of the exams are things she talked about for 3 seconds, literally.

DO NOT TAKE THIS PROF. She has to be the worst Prof. I have ever taken. She expects her students to know everything and do all the work by themselves. She fails you if you mess up on one tiny part of the instructions. She gives no directions and gets mad when you ask her questions. When you email her she just brushes you off. just avoid at all cost

Worst teacher EVER! Do not take her. She expects you to already know everything and acts as if this class is a "refresher." She has never taught bio before, and it is very obvious. She does not listen to feedback. Don't even bother emailing because she will only look at the first sentence or not read it at all. I fear for my grade with her.

She is absolutely horrible. Expects you to "know" everything and only relies on the book. She cannot call herself a professor when she has never taught Biology before. The kind of professor who sets everyone for failure. The way she grades is critical and its ridiculous. Everyone and I in the class hates her.

Do NOT take her.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters
